'''House Wylde''' is a vassal house which holds fealty to [[House Baratheon]] of [[Storm's End]].
sections.Known members: *Ser {[[Willem Wylde]]}, a member of the [[Kingsguard]] of [[King of the Andals and the First Men|King]] [[Daeron II Targaryen]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Wylde is a noble house from [[Rain House]] in the Stormlands. It is one of the principal houses sworn to House Baratheon. According to semi-canon sources they blazon their arms with a blue-green maelstrom on gold.
